text: Mme ere ka Keresete a le mogolo thata, Mowa O O Boitshepo o re tlhagisa go mo reetsa, go ela tlhoko go utlwa lentswe la gagwe gompieno, le go itsa dipelo tsa rona go nna kgatlhanong nae, jaaka bana ba Iseraele ba ne ba dira. Ba ne ba ithatafatsa dipelo go nna kgatlhanong le lorato lwa one ba bo ba o ngongoregela mo sekakeng a santse a ba leka.
